attributes.action: Remove visa and passport requirements for Ukrainian refugees NOW
attributes.additional_details: Ukraine is one of our European allies and is at its most vulnerable state since World War 2. We need to allow Ukrainians to take refuge in our country immediately to keep them safe and protected.
attributes.background: The Government need to drop the visa and passport requirements for Ukrainian refugees right now and allow them to seek safety and protection in our country.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
